sentence: Terrell Edmunds wasn’t kept as the strong safety next to Minkah Fitzpatrick, although he could be a cheaper option to return if the Steelers decide to avoid bringing Mathieu on board.

title: First Call: Tyrann Mathieu says he got a call from Mike Tomlin; multiple theories on Bruce Arians' latest 'retirement'

sentence: “We’ve seen him deliver explosive games, but his best performance is still the one we saw in his NFL debut, when he cooked (Steelers All-Pro free safety) Minkah Fitzpatrick for 147 yards and two touchdowns in 2019,” he concludes.

title: Proposed Trade Sees Ravens Send Former First-Round WR to Chiefs
